form.label: NMON TOP: Resources Usage per Command Invocation
form.description: TOP Processes CPU and Memory utilization using Bubble charts

search.query: | tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) ($osfilter$) groupby "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" | sort limit=0 "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull count | fields TOP_ALLOS.frameID

| tstats count AS count from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) ($osfilter$) groupby "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS count by "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" | sort limit=0 "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull count | fields TOP_ALLOS.hostname

| tstats max("TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) (TOP_ALLOS.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) `$timefilter$(TOP_ALLOS)` groupby _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU by _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" | rename "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_ALLOS.Command" AS Command "TOP_ALLOS.PID" AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,Command,pct_CPU | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As value,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(value) As value, sum(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | stats $statsmode$(value) AS $statsmode$_Usage_per_single_core by Command | sort - $statsmode$_Usage_per_single_core

| tstats max("TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) (TOP_ALLOS.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) `$timefilter$(TOP_ALLOS)` groupby _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU") AS pct_CPU by _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" | rename "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_ALLOS.Command" AS Command "TOP_ALLOS.PID" AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,Command,pct_CPU | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As value,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(value) As value, sum(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command | stats $statsmode$(value) AS $statsmode$_Usage_per_single_core by hostname,Command | sort - $statsmode$_Usage_per_single_core

div.h1: CPU Single Core Usage per Command Invocation (PIDs aggregation per interval)

div.data-options: {"search": { "type": "token_safe", "value": "| tstats max(TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU) AS pct_CPU from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) (TOP_ALLOS.hostname=$$hostname-prefilter$$) ($$frameID$$) ($$osfilter$$) ($$hostname$$) ($$Command$$) `$$timefilter$$(TOP_ALLOS)` groupby _time, TOP_ALLOS.frameID, TOP_ALLOS.hostname, TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus, TOP_ALLOS.Command, TOP_ALLOS.PID prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max(TOP_ALLOS.pct_CPU) AS pct_CPU by _time, TOP_ALLOS.frameID, TOP_ALLOS.hostname, TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus, TOP_ALLOS.Command, TOP_ALLOS.PID | rename TOP_ALLOS.frameID AS frameID, TOP_ALLOS.hostname AS hostname TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus AS logical_cpus TOP_ALLOS.Command AS Command TOP_ALLOS.PID AS PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,Command,pct_CPU | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | eval usage_per_core=(pct_CPU/100) | stats sum(usage_per_core) As value,last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(value) As value, sum(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,Command | stats $$statsmode$$(value) AS usage by Command | sort - usage | head 100"}, "earliest_time": {"type": "token_safe", "value": "$$timerange.earliest$$" }, "latest_time": {"type": "token_safe", "value": "$$timerange.latest$$" }, "auto_cancel": 90, "preview": true }

div.h1: MEMORY Statistics per Command Invocation (PIDs aggregation per interval)

search.query: | tstats max("TOP_ALLOS.mem_used_MB") AS mem_used_MB from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) (TOP_ALLOS.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) `$timefilter$(TOP_ALLOS)` groupby _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_ALLOS.mem_used_MB") AS mem_used_MB by _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" | rename "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_ALLOS.Command" AS Command "TOP_ALLOS.PID" AS PID | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,Command,mem_used_MB | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,Command | stats $statsmode$(mem_used_MB) AS $statsmode$_mem_used_MB by Command | sort - $statsmode$_mem_used_MB

| tstats max("TOP_ALLOS.mem_used_MB") AS mem_used_MB from datamodel=NMON_Data_TOP.TOP_ALLOS where (nodename = TOP_ALLOS) (TOP_ALLOS.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) ($Command$) `$timefilter$(TOP_ALLOS)` groupby _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" prestats=true span=1m | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("TOP_ALLOS.mem_used_MB") AS mem_used_MB by _time, "TOP_ALLOS.frameID", "TOP_ALLOS.hostname", "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus", "TOP_ALLOS.Command", "TOP_ALLOS.PID" | rename "TOP_ALLOS.frameID" AS frameID, "TOP_ALLOS.hostname" AS hostname "TOP_ALLOS.logical_cpus" AS logical_cpus "TOP_ALLOS.Command" AS Command "TOP_ALLOS.PID" AS PID | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,Command,mem_used_MB | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,frameID,hostname,Command | stats sum(mem_used_MB) As mem_used_MB by _time,hostname,Command | stats $statsmode$(mem_used_MB) AS $statsmode$_mem_used_MB by hostname,Command | sort - $statsmode$_mem_used_MB
